snippet: Global real estate trusts have historically been resilient in an environment of rising interest rates, which many pundits predict.
abstract: Global real estate investment trusts, called REITs, and exchange-traded funds have performed consistently, fueled by growth in United States and abroad, despite volatility in commercial and residential real estate markets.
lead_paragraph: Global real estate trusts have historically been resilient in an environment of rising interest rates, which many pundits predict.

headline.main: You Too Can Be a Global Real Estate Investor
headline.print_headline: You Too Can Be a Global Real Estate Investor
